data.eml:eml: Description of a remarkable new species of ant in the genus Daceton Perty (Formicidae: Dacetini) from South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azorsa, Frank, Sosa-Calvo, Jeffrey (2008): Description of a remarkable new species of ant in the genus Daceton Perty (Formicidae: Dacetini) from South America. Zootaxa 1749: 27-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181707
